1370: Berta moved to Papenhofstede.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Maelkin at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Brundonis in 1370 at age 17.
1372: Gave birth to Menaures in 1372 at age 19.
Lost daughter Brundonis when Brundonis was 3 years old.
1374: Gave birth to Wybel in 1374 at age 21.
1375: Gave birth to Brandekijn in 1375 at age 22.
1376: Gave birth to Didderic in 1376 at age 23.
1377: Gave birth to Hadewigis in 1377 at age 24.
1378: Gave birth to Machtilden in 1378 at age 25.
1390: Lost son Didderic when Didderic was 15 years old.
